
### exericse setup  {.smaller}


* a program has source files compiler.c, main.c, functions.customlang
* compiler.c builds a custom compiler
* functions.customlang needs to be compiled with that compiler
* so normal build process is: 
```
clang -c compiler.c
clang -c main.c
clang -o compiler compiler.o
./compiler -c functions.customlang
clang -o program main.o functions.o
```
